title: Ronald A. Chisholm, Ltd. Recalls Pork Belly Products Produced Without Benefit of Import Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, Aug. 26, 2017 - Ronald A. Chisholm, Ltd., a Toronto, Ontario establishment, is recalling approximately 12,169 pounds of skinless pork belly products that were not presented at the U.S. point of entry for inspection, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service...
impacted_products: Approximately 40-lb. cardboard box containing “FLANC PORC, PORK BELLY.”
